title: cannt log onto japan account
body: my friend recently wanted to move to japan server. he lives in thailand and it keeps giving him error whilist logging in, i can log in just fine from japan. can somebody please help my friend out. idk is it restricted or something

replies.body:
Is he trying to login to the same account from a different region than JP? He'll need to create a new account there to login, or wait until the server transfers are back up.

If he already made an account for the JP server, there might be something blocking his connection to those physical servers (the route would be different than connecting to the NA servers). Have him try the general steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first since they cover the basics.

he has a separate account which he has made but it kept giving him errors
but when he logs into na it works

Hmmmmm sadly I can't read that so I'm not 100% sure which error it is. It might actually be the connection error, which wouldn't be entirely out of the question since that connection would be going to a different login server. Make sure to have them try those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
